instructions: Turn Wi-Fi off and connect to the T-Mobile network. From any home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Under NETWORK CONNECTIONS , tap Tethering and Mobile HotSpot . Tap Mobile HotSpot . Tap the Mobile HotSpot switch to ON . Tap the Menu icon > Configure Mobile HotSpot . Edit the available settings as necessary: Broadcast SSID Security Password Show password Show advanced settings Maximum connections Broadcast channel Auto select When finished, tap Save . If prompted select to allow Wi-Fi access to: All devices Allowed devices only

Check that Wi-Fi and Smartphone Mobile Hotspot are turned off. Connect to the T-Mobile network. From any home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Under NETWORK CONNECTIONS , tap Tethering and Mobile HotSpot . Tap Mobile HotSpot . Tap the Mobile HotSpot switch to turn it ON / OFF . If prompted select to allow Wi-Fi access to: All devices Allowed devices only
